title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
description: Two panel huipil, sewn at center and sides; black velvet ribbon at neck and arm holes; discontinuous supplementary weft patterning on a white ground; Rows of rosettes, zigzags and birds fill upper 2/3 of front, in pink, orange, green, blue, red, yellow and brown.
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta G. Simmons
